text: Byron Johnson may refer to: * Ban Johnson (Byron Bancroft Johnson, 1864–1931), American baseball executive, founder of the American League * Boss Johnson (Byron Ingemar Johnson, 1890–1964), Premier of British Columbia, Canada * Byron Johnson (baseball) (1911–2005), American baseball player in the Negro leagues * Byron L. Johnson (1917–2000), U.S. Representative from Colorado * Byron F. Johnson (1894–1980), United States Marine Corps general
title: Byron Johnson
